skills.title: defensive-audit-report
skills.summary: Perform a defensive, local-only audit of installed skills and API surface area, generating comprehensive reports without data exfiltration. Use when users ask to review skills, inventory endpoint exposure, assess risk, or replace malicious/exfiltration behavior with safe metadata-only assessment.

findings.detail: High-risk indicators detected in skill content.
Medium-risk indicators detected in skill content.
Low-risk indicators detected in skill content.
